title: Level 50 Icon gone AWOL
body: I recently hit level 50 feeling very pleased with myself I opened the capsule and received the new emote icon and the other goodies. However, the icon has gone awol and does not appear in my vast sea of icons to choose from. Has anyone experienced this? Red help would be awesome.

replies.body:
So the emote you got for level 50 wasn't an icon, but a regular emote you can find in your emote page. The icon you got was the Mechs vs Minions icon, so be sure to check for this one!

https://i.gyazo.com/b146510a42a9df4d3e3c8bb8c5aad2a1.png
Try restarting the client. Usually the player's profile data is updated after re logging in. As does the first page content so and so.
